review.title: “Since 2011 a nightmare to work with new shareholders”
review.pros: Pros – Before 2011 old management new their ropes of the business and understood the long term relationship with customers and the difficulty of building and creating new business.
review.cons: Cons – Hedgfund running the company with very short term view to resell the company as soon as they can.Short term view, little resources to develop the business, no idea of the dinamics and peculiarities of the markets outside UKnot active listening and ignoring actual local problemsFEAR CULTURE imposed from 2011
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Understand the business and the long term view. Adjust unrealistic forecast to each market reality by getting to know the markets needs and not the 2 digits profit for tomorrow.Change directorship for more capable ones
